summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Mountain-Shaking Claw

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Mountain-Shaking Claw

To obtain the Mountain-Shaking Claw, you need to defeat Cyan Loong in Bitter Lake in Turtle Island in The New West. This boss requires you to have the Loong Scales."
            - Following Text: "For even more guides and tips on finding all the items in the game, be sure to check out our guide on all the Black Myth: Wukong Weapons locations and Armor and Gear locations, as well as the Gourds, Curios, Vessels, and Transformation Spells locations. You can also find a library of all the Medicine Ingredients and Consumable Items in the game."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.


            
            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
generate_prompt: This is an image from the file 'Mountain-Shaking_Claw.md', This is the 2th image in the document,
